name: Super Neat-o
description:
KNOWN BUG: Being under a door when it closes can break you, forcing a restart. Be careful running under, I couldn't get a bug fix update in time.

Help Neat-O find the Super Repairer! First time building melee combat, wanted to learn how to chain attacks and this was a lot of fun to learn.

Controls: Z and X to jump and attack

Press a direction + attack to attack in that direction, different things react differently to different directional attacks

Down plus jump to roll, just cosmetic

Attack in air to get a tiny second jump
